faq.q1.title: How does VFindz work?
faq.q1.body: Each day, you receive fun photo challenges. Just take a photo matching each challenge to earn virtual coins (Vcoins).
faq.q2.title: And what about Duel mode?
faq.q2.body: Duel mode puts you in direct competition with another player or a friend. The photos are automatically sent for comparison.
faq.q3.title: What about contests?
faq.q3.body: Contests put you in direct competition with other players on a specific challenge. Photos are automatically sent for comparison.
faq.q4.title: Are my photos sent?
faq.q4.body:
In normal mode: your photos stay on your device.
In Duel mode: photos are necessarily sent for comparison.
faq.q5.title: How long are photos kept?
faq.q5.body: All sent photos are deleted at the end of the game.
faq.q6.title: Does VFindz collect my data?
faq.q6.body: No. VFindz does not require registration and does not collect personal information in normal mode.
faq.q7.title: I have a problem, who can I contact?
faq.q7.body: You can write to us at: helpvfind@gmail.com
faq.q8.title: Do I have to create an account?
faq.q8.body: Yes. The app requires you to sign in with a Google (Android) or Apple (iOS) account to join challenges, save scores, and access Duel mode.
faq.q9.title: Privacy Policy (summary)
faq.q9.list1: Photos in normal mode are local and private
faq.q9.list2: Photos from Duel or contest mode are sent temporarily for comparison
faq.q9.list3: All sent data is deleted at the end of the game/contest
faq.q10.title: Ads, personal data and use of Lovapp
faq.q10.body:
To fund the app, VFindz displays ads managed by the Lovapp platform. This service also manages in-app purchases and possible auctions or bonuses.

In this context, certain technical and account data may be temporarily shared or stored:
faq.q10.list4: In-app activity (pages viewed, usage duration, etc.)
faq.q10.list5: Account ID (Google/Apple/email), coin balance, and purchase/auction histories
faq.q10.body2:
üìå All this data is collected only with your explicit consent on first launch, in accordance with GDPR and ePrivacy. You can accept or refuse personalized ads. If refused, only non-targeted ads are shown. You can change your choice anytime in the app's privacy settings.

This data is strictly reserved for the proper functioning of the app (ads, security, backup): it is never sold or used for other purposes.
For any request to delete or access your data, write to: helpvfind@gmail.com.

By using VFindz, you accept this data management policy.
rules.objective.title: Objective
rules.objective.body: Take photos matching the given challenges. Use your creativity and follow the instructions!
rules.function.title: How it works
rules.function.li1: Each challenge requires photographing a specific object or scene
rules.forbidden.title: Forbidden content
rules.forbidden.intro: To ensure a safe and respectful environment, it is strictly forbidden to take or store photos containing:
rules.forbidden.li3: Children (even blurred or from a distance)
rules.forbidden.li5: Drugs, alcohol, or any illicit products
rules.forbidden.li6: Any kind of shocking or inappropriate content
rules.forbidden.masked: Reported photos may be automatically hidden.
rules.data.title: Data
rules.data.body: All data (photos, points, username) is stored on a server.
rules.account.title: Account and login
rules.account.body:
The app requires a Google or Apple account to access game features, rankings, and data saving (challenges, photos, scores, etc.).
No other personal data is collected except for the account ID required for secure access.
rules.ads.title: Ads and personal data
rules.ads.body1:
The VFindz app displays ads to fund its operation.

We use the Lovapp platform to manage ad delivery, including via real-time bidding. This system allows ad partners to offer ads tailored to your profile.

For this, certain technical data may be temporarily shared with partners:
rules.ads.li3: Technical information about your device (system, language, model)
rules.ads.li4: Activity in the app (pages viewed, usage time, etc.)
rules.ads.body2:
üìå These data are only collected with your explicit consent, in compliance with GDPR and ePrivacy Directive.

Upon first launch, you will be asked for consent.
You can accept or refuse personalized ads. If you refuse, only non-targeted ads will be shown.

You can change your choice anytime in the app‚Äôs privacy settings.
rules.signal.title: Reporting
rules.signal.body: You can report inappropriate photos in duels. Reported photos will be automatically hidden if necessary.
rules.photo.title: Photo Contest Rules
rules.photo.objet: The VFindz photo contest is free, with no purchase required, and rewards the photo with the most user votes.
rules.photo.cond: Participation is open to anyone with a VFindz user account. Only one entry per person per contest is allowed.
rules.photo.access: Access to the contest page (posting a photo and voting) is unlocked once per day via a reward ad. Premium users get direct access without ads.
rules.photo.votes:
Each day, a user gets 3 votes on the contest page (ad or Premium). Premium users get 6 votes per day without ads.
It is possible, once per day, to watch a bonus ad to recharge votes:
rules.photo.votes2: A user can vote only once per day for the same participant, except after a bonus ad: they can then vote once more for the same person.
rules.photo.winner:
At the end of the contest period, the photo with the most votes is declared the winner.
In the event of a tie:
rules.photo.winner.li1: A fair draw may be held, or
rules.photo.winner.li2: A new tiebreaker vote may be organized, or
rules.photo.winner.li3: The final choice will be made by the moderation team, based on quality, originality, and adherence to the theme.
rules.photo.winner.li4: The chosen method will be announced
rules.photo.prize: The winner will receive the prize announced during the contest. The prize cannot be exchanged or refunded.
rules.photo.fraud: Any attempt at fraud, abuse, or use of multiple accounts will result in immediate exclusion from the contest and loss of any possible winnings.
rules.photo.privacy: Data collected as part of the contest is processed in accordance with the VFindz app‚Äôs privacy policy.
rules.photo.accept: Participation in the contest implies full acceptance of these rules. A link to these rules is available at any time in the app.

index.title: VFindz
index.onboard1.title: Welcome to VFind!
index.onboard1.body: Get a list of fun and creative challenges every day.
index.onboard2.title: Take photos
index.onboard2.body: Throughout the day, photograph the challenges and be creative.
index.onboard3.title: Compare
index.onboard3.body: Play solo, against strangers or friends and compare your photos!
index.onboard4.title: Win
index.onboard4.body: Earn coins and buy exclusive frames to customize your photos!
index.rgpd.title: Privacy & Ads
index.rgpd.body1:
VFindz uses advertising IDs to show you personalized ads.
You can refuse or accept personalization.
index.rgpd.body2: (You can change your mind later in the settings)
